title: Explain this to me
body: I’m playing Jax and building hybrid damage/tank. Enemey Nunu builds full tank, not one damage item yet can one shot me and my whole team while he is two levels below me. How is that fair. I have to build at least a couple damage items to do good damage but he gets to one shot me with full tank. This is what I hate with this game. I think Assassins are fine because they are squishy but having a full tank Nunu one shot me is not ok

replies.body:
Because you walked into his fucking fully charged ult and stood there like idiots?

Nunu has always done that. It has a huge charge time and is very detectable even if you cant see it.

sorry but now we know you are lying. His bite doesn't do enough damage whatsoever to one shot anything at any point in the game regardless of build. 60 / 100 / 140 / 180 / 220 (+ 50% AP) (+ 5% bonus health) that is how much damage his bite does to you. Explain to me how that is enough to one shot you in any capacity?

He stacks health and that increases damage because of the scaling with bounus health. That should be obvious

Most nunu's at most will get 4000 health, which means his bite is 420 damage. There is physically no way for that to one shot, considering base MR will remove about 100 damage. Even at level 1 no item adc will not die from a Nunu q. Please stop exaggerating, this argument is stupid.

> [{quoted}](name=Dragart,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vQZ5mZRg,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2019-01-13T21:32:07.712+0000)
>
> He stacks health and that increases damage because of the scaling with bounus health. That should be obvious

I am going to make it easy for you... let's assume that the Nunu has 6 items and that all of the items are {{item:3083}} which gives the most health in the game. So that's 800*6 which is 4800 HP now we get the 5% of that is 240 so... you add that to the base of 220 and Nunu is getting what? 460 damage? then you add whatever bonus HP and AP he gets from runes and he'll reach about 500-520 damage at most... tell me what ADC or any champion whatsoever is going to have that little HP? literally nunu's bite will never be able to one shot anyone, ever, at any point in the game. Once again, let me ask this... how is Nunu one shotting you with his bite if he is going full tank? he cannot. There is no argument you can make at all since all you are doing is exaggerating to such ridiculous degree in the vain hopes that somehow someone believes in your blatant lies

It is magic damage with far lower bases and ratios than his ult. That is completely illogical.

If you are going to whine about shit, at least whine about the right shit.

TL;DR no you ate his ult like bots.

There is no way his bite was doing over about 350 base damage, mathematically impossible.

Next!

Well let's break it down

Nunu's bite does 220 base damage with 5 points in it, has a 50% AP ratio and a 5% bonus HP ratio, The only AP he had was the 20 from the offense runes and possibly an extra 30 from water walker, looks like 3 dragons were killed so lets assume they were all fire dragons, so another 12 AP for nunu, with his items, he would have gotten 1528 HP, he also did not take any HP in his runes, so his Q damage would have been 220+31+76.4 for a total of 327.4 damage before looking at magic resist, which means there is absolutely no way he could be one shotting you from full HP with this, he would actually have a hard time tickling a Jax with this.

 I'd like to see the clip and get some more context because Nunu is far from broken, especially compared to **Jax. **
